character.name: Alptuğ ILDIZ
character.description: Hi! I'm Alptuğ, a software engineer passionate about creating user-friendly, interactive, and visually appealing interfaces using modern web technologies. I mainly work with React, Next.js, and TypeScript, and also provide effective solutions using technologies like Vue.js, PHP, and SQL when needed. I enjoy building software focused on performance, simplicity, and a great user experience.

items.title: Frontend Developer

items.title: Software Developer
items.description: Contributed to enterprise-level projects with JavaScript and PHP, developing both frontend and backend components. Focused on delivering user-centric solutions.
